string.value: Now that everything has been revealed, you get the unenviable task of explaining it all to his highness, the Mushking.
You have to bring the #b#t4032387##k given to you by #bPrincess #p1300002##k to #b#p1300000##k and explain what really happened.
You explained to #b#p1300000##k everything that happened.

string.name: summary
string.value: You have to bring the #b#t4032387##k given to you by #bPrincess #p1300002##k to #b#p1300000##k and explain what really happened.

My father must be concerned about me, and I must notify him of what's going on. I don't think he's going to believe that the #bPrime Minister#k was the traitor. Take this #bEmblem#k with you. That's the only thing that'll make him believe you.

And also… Please take this #b#t4032386##k to him as well. It's a symbol of their surrender, so we should keep it within our Empire and use it to let the whole world know of King Pepe's evil plot to overthrow the Empire.
I trust you to get this done. Please let my dad know that I want nothing more than to eliminate these cronies and see him safely in the castle soon.
He won't believe you unless you take this emblem with you. Take it.
What…?! What? The #bPrime Minister#k was behind all this? No…! No way…! Wait, this is…!

Oh, it really is our #b#t4032387##k. How could this have happened? I trusted him with everything. It really is all my fault. It's all my fault for failing to take good care of my family and letting my empire down. *Sniff sniff*
Anyway, thank goodness all this is done. Now we can concentrate on removing the rest of their army and reclaiming what is rightfully our castle. Thank you.
The #b#t1082254##k that I have given you is a glove that has been passed down for generations throughout the history of our great empire. Please put it to good use.
What? What are you saying? Are you accusing the #bPrime Minister#k of being the culprit? Then show me some proof…!
